body:
hello my name is cobblemonster10 and have been connected to avicus for almost 2 years now.
I have started my channel (youtube) and will hopefully post some avicus nebula there.

here it is: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEGTg38MWVzu2yhTpnwMxcQ
pls subscribe it helps out a lot. I dont upload that often but I try. Pls subscribe.
Thanks for reading :)
